GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of an article by its id

article.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
article.author: icellusedkars

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates an article by its id and responds with the updated article if successful

article.title: Student SUES Mitch!
article.author: rogersop
article.body: We all love Mitch and his wonderful, unique typing style. However, the volume of his typing has ALLEGEDLY burst another students eardrums, and they are now suing for damages

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments for an article by its id

comments.body: What do you see? I have no idea where this will lead us. This place I speak of, is known as the Black Lodge.
comments.author: icellusedkars

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a comments for an article by its id and responds with the posted comment if successful

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes a comment by its id and responds with no content if successful

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users
